system.description:
Trigger: Start of an Activation of a creature on the user's Team during a League Battle.

Effect: The user selects one of the below Actions, using the selected Action as a Free Action rather than its standard Activation Cost.

  • Use
  • Draw/Store
  • Bestow
  • Recall
  • Send Out
  • A [Style] or [Command] Action, other than Taskmaster!

actions.name: Taskmaster!
